content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-7.0, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Boiler at position (-7.0, 23.5)
- Steam Engine at position (-3.5, 23.5)
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group connecting the offshore pump to the boiler

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Furnace 1 at position (-16.0, -49.0) with a burner inserter at position (-17.5, -48.5) supplying it
- Furnace 2 at position (-14.0, -49.0) with a burner inserter at position (-13.5, -47.5) supplying it
- Wooden Chest at position (-13.5, -46.5) connected to Furnace 2 via a burner inserter at position (-13.5, -47.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-11.5, -44.5) connected to the system via a belt group

### Transport Belt System
Consists of:
- Belt Group connecting various positions to facilitate movement of items between furnaces, chests, and inserters
- Belt from position (-16.5, -48.5) to (-16.5, -46.5)
- Belt from position (-14.5, -45.5) to (-14.5, -47.5)
- Belt from position (-14.5, -45.5) to (-14.5, -43.5)

### Research Lab
- Lab with missing science packs, positioned for future research activities

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source items are available for the inserters to pick up to avoid them being idle

### Furnace Source is Full
- Regularly extract items from the furnace to prevent it from becoming full and halting production
